title: Bug 47910: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: When calling 'ajc sourceroots <mydir> outjar <my.jar>', an output file is created with a .jar extension, but it is not a valid jar file because there is no MANIFEST.MF file.
OB: The resulting file created using the 'outjar' parameter does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file.
EB: When using the 'outjar' parameter, the resulting file should be a valid jar file with a MANIFEST.MF file.
Context: The 'ajc' command has an 'outjar' parameter to create a jar file, but the generated file does not include the required MANIFEST.MF file.
